department.en: International Master of Business Administration program

goal.ch:
**Mandory prerequisites: Financial Accounting; Suggested prerequisites: Auditing
This course consists of two parts. The first part introduces the database structure usually used in accounting information systems and basic skills of data retrieval and analytics. The second part is designed to introduce and discuss various tools in accounting and auditing. Students are expected to obtain related knowledge for serving as auditors or system consultants in the information era. This course aims to1. provide students with concepts of relational database and SQL.2. prepare students with basic skills of data analytics in business and auditing.3. provide students with basic knowledge and skills in visualization and 4. provide students with the basic skills in robotic process automation (RPA).“
